title: Best Dance
body:
Which champion do you think has the best dance animation?

Personally, I <3 {{champion:106}} 

Especially when he gets to the second half, leaning back and pumping his paws in the air.
It's so troll. You stand there doing it, with passive up, allow yourself to get poked a bit, and then Q in when they get close enough.
I have initiated many a teamfight (in ARAM) via Voli dance.

So whose dance do you like most and why?

replies.body:
I like how everyone says something different. It is a credit to Rito, that everyones favourite is unique.

I have to agree with Knuuckles, I love the WW thriller dance too, especially as a child of the 80's.

And yeah, activating Shaco ult and double worming is OP as fuck.

Great thread guys, keep the feedback rolling.
Garen, straight up all his emotes are just troll

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XEUs3AEj,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-09-07T10:35:54.849+0000)
>
> Garen, straight up all his emotes are just troll

 der der der der der der der der der der der der der der der der der der der der der der der der gar gar gar gar gar gar gar gar gar gar gar gar gar gar gar gar gar gar
Vilemaw is obviously the best dancer.

Probably Pentakill Yorick's new dance (i am a bass player)

or Taliyah's, i like that one too.


But Yasuo's is pretty decent. 
and Ryze.... just so swag
whilst zilean has best laugh or at least on par with teemo and an annoying kit, his dance is kinda eh in terms of troll.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XEUs3AEj,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2016-09-08T02:43:52.830+0000)
>
> whilst zilean has best laugh or at least on par with teemo and an annoying kit, his dance is kinda eh in terms of troll.

if you spam it he claps
Jinx probably has my favourite! Love the reference {{champion:222}}
Trundle's dance is the epitomy of troll.
Nasus' dance is best for the trolls, Ezreal's is funny if you know where it comes from and Infernal Nasus' Snoop Dogg impression is sick as!

DJ Sona.

Best {{champion:22}}  in the entire game IMO

Shaco, the worm dance is best dance. Plus with his ult he can worm dance x2 and he's already infuriating so throwing some bm in there is among the most tilting things in the game. Also baiting people into chasing you into deathbushes as ap shaco with like 50 boxes in there makes chasing a bming shaco very dangerous, or you kill him whilst he's busy doing the worm only to discover it was just a 600ap clone that will 100-0 you when you kill it, or you poke the clone safely only to have the real shaco pop up behind you, 100-0 you and then do the worm dance right next to his clone.

Gragas.
Just look how sexy it is
